member.name: M:OrchardCore.ResourceManagement.ResourceManager.GetUpperBoundVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the upper bound value of a required version number. For instance, 3.1.0 returns 3.1.1, 4 returns 5.0.0, 6.1 returns 6.2.0.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.ResourceManagement.ResourceManager.GetLowerBoundVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the lower bound value of a required version number. For instance, 3.1.0 returns 3.1.0, 4 returns 4.0.0, 6.1 returns 6.1.0.
